name: CHOP
description: CHOP is a 2D arena fighting game with a hell of a lot of gore and fast-paced action. Swords will fly, bodies will be chopped, tons of blood will be shed and you'll probably end up hating your friends !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32-bit) Processor: 2.5Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphic card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended. Try the demo to ensure you meet minimum specs.
